legal_notice:
*A valid E-mail is required for registering the application and obtaining Cakewalk technical support.

**SONAR includes a 30 day trial of the MP3 encoder. Cakewalk does not own the license to the MP3 format, and because not all users require the MP3 format, Cakewalk does not force you to pay for the license.

Free 3rd Party Encoders can be configured for use in the application or you can purchase the encoder unlock as DLC.
